properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.site-address: 25 Cattle Market Street
properties.notes: Conversion of former public house (Class A4) to 4no. one bedroom apartments and 1 no. two bedroom apartment (Class C3) and construction of three storey building at rear to provide 1no. two bedroom apartment and 1no. two bedroom duplex.

properties.site-address: St Peters Methodist Church, Park Lane

properties.site-address: Carrow Works
properties.notes: Proposed GNLP allocation for approx 1200 homes (GNLP3053).It would form part of the wider East Norwich Strategic Regeneration Area (Deal Ground, Utilities Site and Carrow Works (GNLP0360 & GNLP3053) for 2000 dwellings.. Proposed GNLP allocation for residential led mixed use development including housing, community, education and leisure facilities, local employment and retail, local greenspace, biodiversity areas and recreational open space.
